data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 316,342 lost people in  Wuhai, Nei Mongol, China have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Wuhai, Nei Mongol, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Wuhai to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Wuhai to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Wuhai.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Evenki people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Evenki people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Evenki people is yours.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Wuhai, Nei Mongol, China so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Wuhai an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.section_summary:
the county of Wuhai, Nei Mongol, China has a population of 348,400.

We estimate Wuhai has 26,430 people who might know Jesus, 5,628 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 316,342 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Wuhai, Nei Mongol, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”
